attributes.action: Herefordshire Council to solve Herefords traffic issues by building a by pass.
attributes.background: The people of Herefordshire are sick and tired of sitting in their cars waiting for local politicians to make up thier mind. Every major town along the route of the A49 except Hereford has a by pass. Our city will wither and die without investment in better roads.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Planning decisions are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
